summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2586, for the improvement of Nickerson Street, from 3rd Avenue North to 3rd Avenue West; all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same to a width of 14 feet, under Ordinance No. 30209 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
